name: web-scraper-app
description: 一款简洁直观的网页爬虫工具，采用苹果风格设计

scripts.start: echo 'Static site - open index.html in browser'
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp -f index.html styles.css script.js api-mock.js public/ || (if not exist public mkdir public && copy index.html public\ && copy styles.css public\ && copy script.js public\ && copy api-mock.js public\)

author: Web Scraper Team
